hero.subtitle: The best São João festival in the countryside! 2025

feature1.title: Great Attractions
feature1.description: The best forró artists and Northeastern music gathered in one place.

feature2.title: Prime Location
feature2.description: Easy access and complete infrastructure for you to enjoy the best of São João.

feature3.title: 15 Days of Celebration
feature3.description: From June 14 to 28, the biggest June festival in the countryside of Pernambuco.

location.venueName: São João de Arcoverde Event Park

cta.title: Don't Miss the Biggest São João in the Countryside!
cta.description: Come celebrate with us the São João de Arcoverde 2025, with the best attractions and the most authentic June festival.

sponsors.description: São João de Arcoverde 2025 is made possible with the support of these important institutions and companies.
